      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(User newUser,
                       UserManager.LocalUserCallback callback)
        Updates the local user. This method will update the user stored in memory, locally, and in firebase. If the user's Id already exist, then the exist user document will be updated(replaced). Note: Changing user id or creating new users requires UserReadyCalled to be registered to LocalUserManager Note2: Upon changing user id, user should be given the option to permanently delete the old profile. Then be switched to the new profile
        Parameters:
        newUser - user to be made or updated
        callback - callback
        Throws:
        UserManager.ContextNotSetException - Throws exception if no context has ever been set for this LocalUserManager

      • onIdReady

        Please don't call this method although it is necessary so don't delete me

        onIdReady in interface IdGen.IDCallBackable
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the user
